name: Terra Incognita
description: You may only take the opponents jungle buffs

name: Attack Speed $godName
description: You must build atleast $random 3-4 attack speed items

name: Cover it all
description: You need 1 physical protection item $br 1 magical protection $br 1 movement speed item $br 1 damage item $br 1 stacking item $br 1 attack speed item

name: What is damage?
description: You may NOT buy any damage increasing items

name: [VSTB]
description: You must return to the base every 4 minutes

name: Jungle Control
description: You cannot kill minions while one of your jungle buffs is up

name: Fists of Strength
description: You may not use any abilities

name: You shall survive!
description: Atleast 2 real players with 3 bots in 5v5 Arena. Your friendly bots may NOT die

name: Carefull, $GodName
description: You may only hit an enemy three times, then you must return into jungle for 10 seconds

name: I see you
description: Do NOT go into stealth mode

name: Rain of Chaos
description: You must stack full cooldown reduction and use your Ultimate on cooldown

name: Failed Engineering
description: You may not set any cannons during the gameplay

name: Dude, where
description: Your ultimate is banned in this match. Good luck

name: Ain't nobody got time do' dat!
description: You are lazy, you may not retreat to the base at any time

name: Miaw!
description: Use your Ultimate whenever it

name: Hit the Lightning Balls!
description: You may only discharge if you enemy has 1 lightning bolt

name: Poor mans land
description: You may only hold 4 items at any given time (including potions, excluding actives)

name: Quiet!
description: You may not communicate in any way under the match

name: Ullr's broken bow
description: You may only stay in axe stance

name: Dr. Jones to the rescue!
description: You may only play in light stance

name: Eww!
description: You may not use your kiss at any time

name: Let me guide you!
description: You must cast your portal on a wall that directs into the jungle when you use it

name: Release the Kraken!
description: You can only engage with your ultimate

name: Tsunami
description: You must tower dive with your Ultimate, whenever it

name: Let me carry your kills
description: You cannot get any kills during the match

name: Wait for it
description: You may not use your ultimate before you have all three stones ready

name: Where's my bees?!
description: You are not allowed to use your 1st ability

name: No boom boom
description: You are NOT allowed to explode any of your corpses

name: Cannibalism is illegal
description: You are NOT allowed to heal from corpses

name: Turbo Spider
description: full movement speed items

name: Heavy metal
description: You can not stack your shackles

name: Naked Tank
description: You are NOT allowed to buy ANY protection items

name: Face Tank
description: Maximize your 1 as soon as possible

name: Time never stands still
description: Build atleast 3 movement speed items and 2 attack speed items

name: Love is stupid
description: You cannot use your hearts to heal allies

name: Shields of Air!
description: You cannot use your 3

name: Bounce, bounce, bounce
description: You need to bounce your 1 off of any obstacles when you use it

name: No monkey business
description: You may not use your $random 1-4

name: Oprah Money!
description: You are not allowed to go back to buy items before you have 3000G

name: Facebook Money
description: You are not allowed to go back to buy items before you have 5000G

name: I need to lose weight!
description: You cannot use your portals on yourself
